method.name: allDevices
method.tp:docstring: Get the list of UPnP devices currently discovered.

arg.tp:docstring: A list of the devices as pairs of first udn and second type.

method.name: devicesByParent
method.tp:docstring: Get the list of UPnP devices currently discovered which have the device with the given udn as parent device.

arg.tp:docstring: A list of the devices as pairs of first udn and second type.

method.name: devicesByType
method.tp:docstring: Get the list of UPnP devices currently discovered which are of the given type.

arg.tp:docstring: A list of the devices as pairs of first udn and second type.

method.name: deviceDetails
method.tp:docstring: Get the details of the device with the given udn.

arg.tp:docstring: Details of the device. TODO: turn into StringVariantMap to be extendable

signal.name: devicesAdded
signal.tp:docstring: One or more devices have been discovered on the network.

arg.name: devices
arg.tp:docstring: A list of the devices as pairs of first udn and second type.

signal.name: devicesRemoved
signal.tp:docstring: One or more devices have disappeared from the network.

arg.name: devices
arg.tp:docstring: A list of the devices as pairs of first udn and second type.
